androidx.leanback.widget

Class ParallaxTarget.DirectPropertyTarget<T,V extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.leanback.widget.ParallaxTarget
      • androidx.leanback.widget.ParallaxTarget.DirectPropertyTarget<T,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of target object.
    V - Type of value, either Integer or Float.
    Enclosing class:
    ParallaxTarget

    public static final class ParallaxTarget.DirectPropertyTarget<T,V extends java.lang.Number>
extends ParallaxTarget
    DirectPropertyTarget is to support direct mapping into either Integer Property or Float Property. App uses convenient method ParallaxEffect#target(Object, Property) to add a direct mapping.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • isDirectMapping

        public boolean isDirectMapping()
        Returns true as DirectPropertyTarget receives a number to update Property in directUpdate(Number).
        Overrides:
        isDirectMapping in class ParallaxTarget
        Returns:
        True if direct mapping, false otherwise.

      • directUpdate

        public void directUpdate(java.lang.Number value)
        Description copied from class: ParallaxTarget

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
